name: Trial by Fire (Vanderbander)
description:
Here is a read along Twine game!

Trial by Fire is a cute, simple roguelike where you play as a sentient fire who is trying to survive a swampland swarming with rainclouds that are trying to put you out! Pick up oil and charcoal to keep your fuel up, otherwise you will flicker out and die.

Playthrough the Twine game linked above to get some backstory on our firey little friend.
